Johnson Author : Roberto Ventura Date : 2017-02-08 Description : This file is an example of dynamic programming by optimizing number of coins based on target and denominations Notes : None Warnings : None Exceptions : None ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Revision History ---------------- Rev Date Modified by: Reason for change/modification ----- ---------- ------------ -----------------------------------------------------------
